author: mentiro
msg: Changed configuration to load file based on configUrl parameter.  If configUrl parameter isn't found, falls back to jsecurity.ini.  If that isn't found, loads from the config filter param.

author: mentiro
msg: Refactoring of filters to make better use of inheritance hierarchy.

author: mentiro
msg: Updated Spring JSecurity Filter to use SpringConfiguration object for configuring.  Modified cipher to accept the key as bytes and use the default unless one is specified.  Modified remember me to accept pass through args from the security manager.  Added support for global properties in the ini config. Added a user and pass thru filter.  Added redirection after login by saving request in the session.

author: pharaohh
msg: enabled one more username null check to avoid NPE

author: mentiro
msg: Fix to resolve JSEC-108 by applying principalSuffix to username.
